title: Honoring Dr. Matthew Kuschner upon the occasion of being inducted into the John F. Kennedy High School Hall of Fame
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Dr. Matthew Kuschner upon the occasion
of being inducted into the John F. Kennedy High School Hall of Fame

WHEREAS, It is the practice of this Legislative Body to take note of and
publicly acknowledge individuals of remarkable integrity  and  character
who  have  inspired  and brought pride to our majestic Empire State with
their strong contributions to the community and model citizenship; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Dr.
Matthew Kuschner upon the occasion of being inducted into  the  John  F.
Kennedy  High School Hall of Fame; to celebrate this auspicious event, a
Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony and Dinner was held at the  high  school
on Saturday, November 13, 2010; and
  WHEREAS,  Dr.  Matthew Kuschner graduated in 1977 from John F. Kennedy
High School which is located in the Bellmore-Merrick Central High School
District; and
  WHEREAS, He then graduated from The State University of  New  York  at
Albany and continued his studies at New York Chiropractic College; and
  WHEREAS,  Formerly  a  private  practitioner, Dr. Matthew Kuschner now
serves as a medical investigator for a national insurance company; and
  WHEREAS, As a longtime community advocate, Dr. Matthew Kuschner  is  a
15-year  Trustee  with  the North Merrick Board of Education, a six-year
trustee and/or Officer with the  Bellmore-Merrick  Central  High  School
District Board of Education, and a Member of the Bellmore-Merrick Commu-
nity Wellness Center Board of Directors; and
  WHEREAS,  Furthermore, Dr. Matthew Kuschner serves as the Commissioner
of CYO and PAL Football, and is a  three-year  Trustee  of  Congregation
B'nai Israel; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is the sense of this Legislative Body that when individ-
uals of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought  to  our  atten-
tion,  they  should  be celebrated and recognized by all the citizens of
this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Dr. Matthew Kuschner upon the occasion of being inducted into the
John F.  Kennedy High School Hall of Fame; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Dr. Matthew Kuschner, 1914  Frederick  Avenue,  Merrick,  New
York.
